fields.summary: Create manual regression test cases. Schedule/Booking/payment schedule (includes contracts, FX rates, taxes) - Part 3

issuetype.description: Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a user story.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
As a Tester I want to easily find all necessary test cases so that I can plan and execute regression testing.

Problem statement: Some test cases don't exist, some are out of date, some are duplicated, there are too many of test cases and hard to find what we have/don't have and what needs to be tested per given story/sprint/release.

Outcomes: 
 Manual test cases created to cover Ignitia regression testing. 
 Corresponding priorities are set on test cases. So that in future, if we don't have much time to execute all tests, we focus only critical and high. 
If automation test case exist ->link to manual test.
 Find all other test cases related to this functionality > Retire (where applicable), or mark them "Regression = No"
 Place all test cases "Regression = Yes" in corresponding test suite or under filter (if you want to bring few test suites under one roof) 
 Update confluence with link to test suite: [https://confluence.mediaocean.com/display/GBP/Test+Suites+and+Test+Cases] 
 Refer to this page for more guidelines (in some cases) [https://confluence.mediaocean.com/display/GBP/Automation+Coverage+for+Critical+Functionality] 
 All bugs found on the way to be logged (functional, performance, UX etc)

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
As a Tester I want to easily find all necessary test cases so that I can plan and execute regression testing.

Problem statement: Some test cases don't exist, some are out of date, some are duplicated, there are too many of test cases and hard to find what we have/don't have and what needs to be tested per given story/sprint/release.

Outcomes: 
 Manual test cases created to cover Ignitia regression testing. 
 Corresponding priorities are set on test cases. So that in future, if we don't have much time to execute all tests, we focus only critical and high. 
If automation test case exist ->link to manual test.
 Find all other test cases related to this functionality > Retire (where applicable), or mark them "Regression = No"
 Place all test cases "Regression = Yes" in corresponding test suite or under filter (if you want to bring few test suites under one roof)

Update confluence with link to test suite: [https://confluence.mediaocean.com/display/GBP/Test+Suites+and+Test+Cases] 
 Refer to this page for more guidelines (in some cases) [https://confluence.mediaocean.com/display/GBP/Automation+Coverage+for+Critical+Functionality]

All bugs found on the way needs to be logged (functional, performance, UX etc)

fields.summary: Create manual regression test cases. Prisma integration: Cost Refresh, Reconciliation - Part1

status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
As a Tester I want to easily find all necessary test cases so that I can plan and execute regression testing.

Problem statement: Some test cases don't exist, some are out of date, some are duplicated, there are too many of test cases and hard to find what we have/don't have and what needs to be tested per given story/sprint/release.
